                                             int quantity)
                                      throws RequestError
Description copied from interface: Plants
Will estimate a date and time that the give product can be produced in the given quantity.
This estimate is a one of, thus if the same information is used I a subsequent Plants.requestProduction(Product, int) there is no guarantee it will be equal.

Specified by:
